basics.name: Luna Lu
basics.summary: Creative, self-motivated and passion for how product could improved. Leading team to design both mobile app and website plaform project in college, which have 3661 user and outstanding in competition.  Study and travel through 6 counties.

work.summary: Deepblu is the online community where scuba divers continue their diving adventures above the surface.
highlights: Hosted meetings as a SCRUM Master and managed project process.
Conducted Mobile app localization into 9 languages. Consistently improved wording and translated mobile App into Chinese.

work.summary: E-Zilla is  a bike sharing service aimed to fulfil urban life's need conveniently, anytime, anywhere, by combining innovation and gamification.
highlights: Designed user experience for mobile app.
Self-study through audited UX course in CS department and joined HPX book club.

volunteer.summary: Ladies that UX Taipei is a global community for women working in the UX field.

awards.title: Long Term-Cheers Entrepreneurial Competition
awards.awarder: Admitted into round one along with other 75 teams out of a total of 250 teams.
awards.summary: The competition is hosted by Ministry of Science and Technology,R.O.C and acer Fundation. Write business plane and co-working with cross-university team.
